greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n = abc...def in decimal notation then the right digit sum function = abc...def + bc...def + c...def + ... + def + ef + f.
mathematica: Table[d = IntegerDigits[n]; rd = 0; While[ Length[d] > 0, rd = rd + FromDigits[d]; d = Drop[d, 1]]; rd, {n, 0, 75} ]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jan 05 2002
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 07 2002
